thread.title: Career Development Solutions Wraps Up Successful "Counselor Day" Event Series | FinancialContent Business Page
thread.title_full: Career Development Solutions Wraps Up Successful "Counselor Day" Event Series | FinancialContent Business Page

author: financialcontent.com
title: Career Development Solutions Wraps Up Successful "Counselor Day" Event Series | FinancialContent Business Page
text:
ANAHEIM, Calif. - Feb. 29, 2024 - PRLog -- Career Development Solutions, LLC, a leading provider of IT and tech career training, is excited to announce the successful conclusion of its recent "Counselor Day" event series, held across six of its training center locations. The events provided attendees with an exclusive behind-the-scenes look at their newly updated training spaces, fostering valuable networking opportunities and professional development sessions.
The "Counselor Day" series welcomed counselors from local workforce centers and partner agencies to explore the rebranded facilities, enjoy networking conversations over coffee and continental breakfast with other agency representatives and partake in a dynamic Tips & Tricks session aimed at boosting productivity using Excel and Outlook.
Attendees had the opportunity to:
Explore Newly Updated Training Spaces : Visitors were given an insider's look at the redesigned training facilities, equipped with state-of-the-art amenities to enhance the learning experience. Connect Over Coffee & Continental Breakfast : The event facilitated meaningful networking opportunities, allowing counselors, professionals and the Career Development Solutions team to connect and exchange insights in a relaxed setting. Participate in Productivity Workshops : A highlight of the Open House series was the Tips & Tricks session led by Career Development Solutions' top-rated instructors. Attendees gained practical insights on Microsoft Office and Excel and firsthand experience of what students experience when they attend class at an in-person branch location. The events were held at Career Development Solutions training center locations in Anaheim, Burbank, Las Vegas, Sacramento, San Diego and Tucson, and provided an immersive experience for participants, enabling them to interact directly with the training environment and experience the quality of education offered to students.
"We are thrilled with the positive response to our Counselor Day series because we love hosting our partners in our training center locations," said Cindy Sutherland, President at Career Development Solutions. "These gatherings allowed us to showcase our commitment to providing top-tier training facilities and resources to our community of learners. We are grateful to all who joined us to make this series successful."
Career Development Solutions extends its appreciation to all attendees, partners and supporters who contributed to the success of the "Counselor Day" series, and applauds all team members whose preparation and hard work ensured a fulfilling event for all involved.
Career Development Solutions has consistently demonstrated its commitment to empowering individuals with the technical skills and industry-recognized credentials needed to re-enter the workforce successfully or change career paths to enter the world of IT and tech. Learn more at www.careerdevelopmentsolutions.com .
Contact
Terry Mott, Client Success Specialist
Career Development Solutions
